title: @schema/message/SUCCESS
description: Message type for successful operation completion

result.description: Tool execution result (optional, can be any type - object, boolean, string, etc.)

text.description: Original event payload property (optional, for CREATE_BUTTON)

id.description: Original event payload property (optional, for TOGGLE_BUTTON, DELETE_BUTTON)

done.description: Original event payload property (optional, for TOGGLE_BUTTON)

viewMode.description: Original event payload property (optional, for SWITCH_VIEW)

newTodoText.description: Original event payload property (optional, for UPDATE_INPUT)
